outputs.output_descr: The project contributes to the emergency response to the severe drought and food crisis affected regions of Kenya through enhancing the capacity for conducting early recovery needs assessment and coordinated early recovery activities. The project has 2 key outputs: 1) Enhanced capacity for coordinated Early Recovery Response, 2) Enhanced livelihoods restoration initiatives for socio-economic recovery for affected communities.

project_descr: Emergency Response to Severe Drought and Food Crisis Affected Regions of Kenya
